DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability and immunogenicity of a 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate (13vPnC) vaccine compared to Prevenar (7vPnC), when given concomitantly with routine paediatric vaccinations in Spain.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating a 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy 2monthold infants Available for the entire study period Exclusion criteria: Previous vaccination with any vaccine before the start of the study Known contraindication to vaccination
